Articles.Description: Nollywood actress, Destiny Etiko has been left overwhelmed with love after she stormed a school in Asaba. The movie star had surprised one of her colleague's daughter in school as she celebrated her birthday. The video she posted online captured the moment sh…
Articles.Content:
Nollywood actress, Destiny Etiko has been left overwhelmed with love after she stormed a school in Asaba.

Articles.Author: Olumide Alake
Articles.Title: “Nollywood Broke Barriers Before Afrobeats”: Omotola Jalade Shares Evergreen Movie Clips to Back Her Claim
Articles.Description: Actress Omotola Jalade Ekeinde recently shared clips from some evergreen movies as she declared Nollywood broke barriers way before Afrobeats. Read more here.
Articles.Content: • Veteran actress Omotola Jalade-Ekeinde has shared some old movies she featured in alongside some of her colleagues like Rita Dominic, Genevieve Nnaji, and Patience Ozokwo, among others
